meanings.definition: To train (an animal) to defecate and urinate in a designated place indoors.
meanings.sent1: She housetrains her puppy to use the pee pad.
meanings.sent2: The cat was housetrained to use the litter box.
meanings.sent3: The hamster thought it was funny to housetrain itself on the tiny toilet.
meanings.sent4: The diligent owner successfully housetrains the parrot to use a mini potty.
meanings.sent5: Housetraining the rabbit made life easier for the pet owner.

meanings.definition: To train (a person) to follow a schedule for using the bathroom.
meanings.sent1: Parents housetrain toddlers to use the toilet at specific times.
meanings.sent2: The nurse housetrained the patient to avoid accidents.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about housetraining adults to avoid bathroom mishaps.
meanings.sent4: She housetrains her family members to maintain bathroom routines.
meanings.sent5: Housetraining the elderly requires patience and consistency.
